column5: A bit of a delay but finally got around to writing a report on our Shekak Lake Trip I was a great trip but we definitely found the fishing a bit tougher this time around Bigger lake and some crazy weather seemed to scatter the fish and it was a really light bite Full report is up here if you are interested http://www.canadafishingguide.net/forum-2/member-trip-reports-1/lake-fever-shekak-lake-with-white-river-air-aug-22-29-2016/ Cheers Gordy
Well composed story there Gordy. I enjoyed reading that along with all the pics. Good stuff.  Cheers
Thanks - I enjoyed writing it Definitely gets the memories flowing of that trip plus old ones Cheers Andrew
Thanks for the report Gordy ! Great read ... Canada winning 5-0 so finished reading your report easily ... Lol Hope to book with WRA next spring !!!
Thanks JD If you have any questions feel free to shoot me a pm We have fished Pickle and now Shekak w WRA
